title: Horizen Scraps Privacy Coin Moniker Amid Regulatory Scrutiny
description: Horizen says it's now simply a layer 0 blockchain after depreciating the shielded pools on its main chain.

title: Israel Seizes $1.7M From Crypto Accounts Linked to Iran’s Quds Force, Hezbollah: Report

title: Swiss Central Bank to Launch Wholesale CBDC Soon Says Chairman Thomas Jordan
description: The Swiss National Bank (SNB) said it plans to issue a wholesale central bank digital currency as a pilot via SIX Digital Exchange, a subsidiary of SIX, an operator of infrastructure for the Swiss and Spanish financial centers. title: BlackRock’s BTC ETF approval hangs in the balance with a 50-chance for greenlight
description: According to Bloomberg senior ETF analyst Eric Balchunas, investment management giant BlackRock has a 50% probability of getting its spot Bitcoin Exchange Traded Fund (ETF) approved. The approval of BlackRock’s Bitcoin ETF could mark a groundbreaking moment for the cryptocurrency industry.  As the world’s largest asset management firm, BlackRock’s foray into the realm of digital ... title: Will Robinhood and Celsius Cause a Massive Crypto Crash by Selling their Stakes in Bitcoin and Ethereum?

title: Statistics Indicate That Altcoin Delistings Surged In June
description:
A crypto analyst and trader, Crypto Sensei, shared in a post on Twitter yesterday that the number of altcoin spot instrument delistings skyrocketed during the month of June. According to the post, there were about 441 delistings throughout the past 30 days. It is worth noting that June saw more of these delisings than during […]

The post Statistics Indicate That Altcoin Delistings Surged In June appeared first on Coin Edition.
